author: leif
msg: Fix a bad bug where the setAutoCommit method of Connections was being ignored.  This meant that it was impossible to make use of transactions unless the pool as a whole was setup so that its auto commit mode was false.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * xdocs/foundation/board/index.xml: Update to 2005-2006 board of directors.

author: reinhard
msg: make Form and Repeater ValidationErrorAware; fix unbalanced SAX-events in jx-macro.xml caused by Ajax implementation; minor code reformatting to make Eclipse happier

author: mmarinschek
msg: Thanks to Bruno Aranda for the patch
